comments:
build i0324:0800
winxp
jdk1.4.2
releng tool 3.0.3

- I was working in a branch for 2 projects (runtime, runtime.tests)
- I committed all my changes
- I selected the 2 projects in the Navigator
- choose "Team -> Release" from the context menu
- it worked away for a while and then I got the following exceptions.

This is bad because:
- I don't know how far the operation went
- it didn't bring up the core.map file so I know it didn't completely finish

I tagged (moving if necessary) manually to work around this and then edited the
core.map file manually.

Marked as major if we believe people should be using the releng tool for releasing.

Note I just got this again using the ibm VM and selecting 1 project in the
workspace.

Note that the operation did seem to complete. I checked the contents of HEAD
versus the tag and there were no differences. And the core.map file was updated
correctly. So perhaps its just problems bringing the Synchronize window into view?
I believe this is fixed in 3.0.4, however reassigning for verification.
